医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
突破性的男性避孕凝胶在临床试验中显示出快速结果男性避孕凝胶结合了激素，可以更快地抑制精子产生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Breakthrough-male-contraceptive-gel-shows-rapid-results-in-clinical-trial.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Breakthrough-male-contraceptive-gel-shows-rapid-results-in-clinical-trial.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b547c7e-f0b7-41fe-8431-b35816add26b Mon, 03 Jun 2024 08:40:00 -0400 Breakthrough male contraceptive gel shows rapid results in clinical trial
1 型糖尿病的良好控制并不能保证预防心脏病根据星期六在 ENDO 2024 上发表的一项研究，患有 1 型糖尿病超过 50 年且没有肾脏并发症的人，尽管血压、胆固醇和血糖水平得到了很好的控制，但仍可能面临患心脏病的巨大风险。协会年会在马萨诸塞州波士顿举行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Excellent-control-of-type-1-diabetes-doesnt-guarantee-protection-from-heart-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Excellent-control-of-type-1-diabetes-doesnt-guarantee-protection-from-heart-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd918319-a27f-4429-9fb8-49ff87274a26 Mon, 03 Jun 2024 08:20:08 -0400 Excellent control of type 1 diabetes doesn't guarantee protection from heart disease
早期生活压力可能导致男性和女性青少年药物滥用星期六在马萨诸塞州波士顿举行的内分泌学会年会 ENDO 2024 上发表的一项研究显示，童年时期的压力与男性和女性青少年早期的药物使用有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Early-life-stress-can-lead-to-substance-use-in-male-and-female-adolescents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Early-life-stress-can-lead-to-substance-use-in-male-and-female-adolescents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fe3c309a-7a43-4341-b3c7-36ac90981ed1 Mon, 03 Jun 2024 07:50:31 -0400 Early life stress can lead to substance use in male and female adolescents
童年缺乏运动与成年后患肝病的风险增加有关一项新的研究发现，每天静坐超过六个小时的儿童在成年后患严重脂肪肝和肝硬化的风险显着增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Childhood-inactivity-linked-to-increased-risk-of-liver-disease-by-young-adulthood.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Childhood-inactivity-linked-to-increased-risk-of-liver-disease-by-young-adulthood.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d6113875-c93d-48fe-83d1-0eea2da7bf98 Mon, 03 Jun 2024 07:42:50 -0400 Childhood inactivity linked to increased risk of liver disease by young adulthood
转移性胰腺癌的实验性治疗在二期临床试验中显示出希望乔治城大学 Lombardi 综合癌症中心的临床医生报告了基于前 6 名转移性胰腺癌患者的结果的有希望的初步结果，该患者参加了实验药物 BXCL701 与免疫治疗药物 pembrolizumab (Keytruda) 联合的 2 期临床试验。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Experimental-treatment-for-metastatic-pancreatic-cancer-shows-promise-in-phase-2-clinical-trial.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Experimental-treatment-for-metastatic-pancreatic-cancer-shows-promise-in-phase-2-clinical-trial.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=64a46a7f-9935-4102-9b76-83c5f7526aff Mon, 03 Jun 2024 07:36:27 -0400 Experimental treatment for metastatic pancreatic cancer shows promise in phase 2 clinical trial
“死亡人数如此之多”：立法者权衡更严格的速度限制和为行人提供更安全的道路聚会即将结束。年轻的主人玛丽亚·里瓦斯·克鲁兹和她的未婚夫雷蒙德·奥利瓦雷斯陪同朋友们到车上告别。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/e28098So-much-deathe28099-Lawmakers-weigh-stricter-speed-limits-safer-roads-for-pedestrians.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/e28098So-much-deathe28099-Lawmakers-weigh-stricter-speed-limits-safer-roads-for-pedestrians.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f3af6c2-40de-4fbf-8a52-045616efdaae Mon, 03 Jun 2024 07:19:27 -0400 ‘So much death’: Lawmakers weigh stricter speed limits, safer roads for pedestrians
SolasCure 入选休斯顿创新英国全球孵化器计划SOLASCURE Ltd (SolasCure) 是一家生物技术公司，开发一种新型治疗方法来改变慢性伤口护理，今天宣布该公司已被选为创新英国在美国休斯顿的全球孵化器计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/SolasCure-selected-for-innovate-UK-global-incubator-programme-in-houston.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/SolasCure-selected-for-innovate-UK-global-incubator-programme-in-houston.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2471ece8-c83b-4b2a-b790-0e72183a1aa3 Mon, 03 Jun 2024 06:41:00 -0400 SolasCure selected for innovate UK global incubator programme in houston
香蕉凝集素在减轻炎症性肠病中的作用重组香蕉凝集素 (rBanLec) 在 IBD 控制和提高疫苗接种率方面的治疗作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/The-role-of-banana-lectin-in-mitigating-炎症-bowel-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/The-role-of-banana-lectin-in-mitigating-炎症-bowel-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1b1346a8-8e33-411a-b3cd-51af07834155 Mon, 03 Jun 2024 06:35:00 -0400 The role of banana lectin in mitigating inflammatory bowel disease
DefiniGEN 和 Atelerix 合作在国际范围内运送体外细胞模型，无需冷冻或低温保存DefiniGEN Ltd. 和 Atelerix Ltd. 今天宣布，他们已成功将体外肝脏模型从英国运送到美国的一家顶级制药客户。两家公司之间的协议将 DefiniGEN 的机械相关 iPSC 肝细胞 (Opti-Heps) 与 Atelerix 的水凝胶保存技术相结合，可防止功能丧失，甚至使敏感样品在环境温度下保持稳定长达两周。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/DefiniGEN-and-Atelerix-collaborate-to-ship-in-vitro-cell-models-internationally-without-the-need-for-freezing-or-冷冻保存.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/DefiniGEN-and-Atelerix-collaborate-to-ship-in-vitro-cell-models-internationally-without-the-need-for-freezing-or-冷冻保存.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a4443128-ae14-4221-9ecb-ca6ef0684338 Mon, 03 Jun 2024 06:33:00 -0400 DefiniGEN and Atelerix collaborate to ship in vitro cell models internationally without the need for freezing or cryopreservation
他汀类药物被发现可通过抑制白细胞介素 33 来预防慢性炎症相关癌症他汀类药物通过抑制白介素 33 (IL-33) 发挥作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Statins-found-to-prevent-chronic-inflammation-lated-cancers-by-inhibiting-interleukin-33.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Statins-found-to-prevent-chronic-inflammation-lated-cancers-by-inhibiting-interleukin-33.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2cc2356c-aeec-4642-a5d0-2b80320c630b Mon, 03 Jun 2024 05:45:00 -0400 Statins found to prevent chronic inflammation-related cancers by inhibiting interleukin-33
